quote: Truth is such a rare thing, it is delighted to tell it. – Emily Dickinson
fact: For some time Frederic Chopin, the composer and pianist, wore a beard on only one side of his face, explaining: "It does not matter, my audience sees only my right side."
joke: Someone broke into my house last night and stole my limbo trophy. How low can you go?
